channel.title: NPCDialouge - DELTA - PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
How do you make it so when you click 'click here to continue', it teleports you to a certain place?
How do you make it so at the top if where the NPC is talking (the dialouge) where it displays his/her name, how can you edit that to a custom name?
Thank you.

item.title: NPCDialouge - DELTA - PLEASE HELP
